altername_name: The Adventures of Brian the Bold
name: Brian the Bold
overview: As a simple peasant boy, you've often dreamt of daring adventures which could bring you great wealth. Now you see your opportunity, good King Frederick's daughter, Leanora has been kidnapped by the evil warlock, Bragen and is being held prisoner in the Black Tower. The boldest knights in the land have all failed to achieve her release. Can you rise to the occasion, rescue the princess and get the reward you have always longed for?
